editionStmt.edition: Digital Edition in Wylie with TEI Markup

licence.p: The Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0) licence applies to this document.

projectDesc.p: This document was created and is made available in the framework of the ERC project “The Dawn of Tibetan Buddhist Scholasticism (11th-13th c.) (TibSchol). This project has received funding from the European Research Council (ERC) under the European Union's Horizon 2020 research and innovation programme (grant agreement No. 101001002). See https://cordis.europa.eu/project/id/101001002

prefixDef.p: In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "db" prefix point to the project's APIS instance, a database system to collect information of entities.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "per" prefix point to the BDRC's data interface's person module.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "zot" prefix point to a record in the projects's Zotero group.
In the context of the TibSchol project, references using the "corpusmd" prefix point to any element in the corpus TEI document via its ID.

body.ab: blo ldan don du gnyer ba yis || bshes gnyen rnams kyis legs par bskul ba'i mthus || shAkya'i dge slong skyabs mchogm{chog} dpal bzang pos || gzhung mchog 'di yi rnam bshar 'di byas so ||

dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa shes rab ces bya ba'i rgya cher bshad pa ¦ tshig don rab tu gsal ba zhes
bya ba ¦ gsung rab kyi de kho na nyid thugs su chung nas ¦ 'chad brtsod brtsom pa la snang ba rab tu rgyas pa'i ¦ sde snod 'dzin pa nyi ma seng ge dang ¦ dpal gsang pa 'dus pa dang ¦ mtha' bral dbu ma chen po sogs ¦ 'phags pa klu sgrub yab sras kyi gzhung lugs la gzhan gyis brdzi bar mi nus pa'i spobs pa spobs is unclear. dge ba can pa
yong dbon po shAkya seng ge dang ¦ lung dang rigs pa'i de kho na nyid phyin ci ma log par smra zhing || chos tshul 'dis la mi phyed pa'i dad pa can | mdo stod pa sangs rgyas 'bum la sogs pas bskul nas ¦ shAkya'i dge slong skyabs mchog dpal bzang pos ¦ dpal ldan zla ba grags pa'i 'grel ba bzhin du ¦ dbang phyug gi lo ¦ smin drug can gyi
zla ba'i dkar phyogs kyi tshes bcu gsum la sbyar ba'o || yi ge pa ni lung dang rigs par smra ba ¦ seng ge rgyal mtshan gyis bgyis so || 'di la brten nas sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rin po che phyogs dang dus dang gnas skabs thams cad du dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par gyur cig |
